subject: Technology
title: The Five Levels of Autonomy
description: A fast breakdown of The Five Levels of Autonomy for builders.

hook.text: Not all self-driving is the same. There are five official levels, and most cars are stuck at level two.

buildup.text: Level 1 is cruise control. Level 2 handles steering and speed but you must watch the road. Level 3 can drive itself sometimes.

discovery.text: Level 4 drives fully without human input in certain conditions. Level 5 drives anywhere, anytime, with no human needed.

twist.text: No consumer car has reached Level 5. Many experts now doubt it will happen within this decade.

climax.text: The jump from Level 2 to Level 5 isn't incremental. Each level is exponentially harder than the last.

punchline.text: We're at Level 2. Level 5 is a different universe of difficulty.

quiz.question: What does Level 5 autonomy mean?
options: The car drives itself anywhere with no human input ever needed
The car can change lanes automatically
